documentation.desc: Retrieves the cursor position for the last message retrieved by the GetMessage function

apidoc.return: the x- and y-coordinates of the cursor position. The x-coordinate is the low order short and the y-coordinate is the high-order short

io-action.desc: retrieves cursor position for the last message retrieved
